steps.text:
CASE RECORDS of the MASSACHUSETTS GENERAL HOSPITAL. Case 21-2016. A 32-Year-Old 
Man in an Unresponsive State.
Fenves AZ(1), Schaefer PW(1), Luther J(1), Pierce VM(1).

Author information:
(1)From the Departments of Medicine (A.Z.F., J.L.), Radiology (P.W.S.), and 
Pathology (V.M.P.), Massachusetts General Hospital, and the Departments of 
Medicine (A.Z.F., J.L.), Radiology (P.W.S.), and Pathology (V.M.P.), Harvard 
Medical School - both in Boston.
